frame.name: Relational_natural_features
frame.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Focal_feature</fen> is defined in relation to a <fen>Landmark_feature</fen>, either as a particular part, or as an immediately bordering entity.
<ex>I'm on the <t>summit</t> <fex name="Landmark_feature">of Mt. Shasta</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Container_possessor
FE.definition: <def-root>The location that the <fen>Focal_feature</fen> is a part of. </def-root>

FE.name: Formational_cause
FE.definition:
<def-root>Indicates the action (or causer) which brings the features of the <fen>Focal_feature</fen> about.
</def-root>

FE.name: Focal_feature
FE.definition: <def-root>A stable bounded area defined by its relation to another landform. This FE is incorporated in each LU in this frame. </def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE is used for the <fen>Name</fen>s of <fen>Focal_feature</fen>s. </def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition: <def-root>A place that a <fen>Focal_feature</fen> is located with respect to. </def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Type</fen> is the subtype of natural feature. </def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description, characteristic, or property of the <fen>Focal_feature</fen> which is not covered by more specific FEs. </def-root>

FE.name: Landmark_feature
FE.definition: <def-root>The landform with respect to which the <fen>Focal_feature</fen> is defined.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: estuarium.n
lexUnit.definition: die wijd is geworden onder invloed van getijdenstroming
